title: Deployment Plan meeting
summary_text: Meeting Transcripts Participants: - Arul (Scrum Master) - Alex (Frontend Developer) - Shiva (Backend Developer) - Robert (QA Engineer) - Steve (UI/UX Designer) Arul: Alright team, let’s start today’s sprint review.
key_points: New caching layer reduced API response time by 40%
Landing page layout updated with improved accessibility labels
Need to test landing page with screen readers
Next week's deployment requires early login for staging verification
Next team retrospective meeting scheduled for November 18th
decisions: Finalize early login time for deployment at 9:10 AM next Wednesday
Schedule next team retrospective meeting for November 18th at 4 PM
action_items: Alex to test backend changes with new frontend build
Robert to test landing page with screen readers
Everyone to log in 20 minutes earlier for deployment
Alex to bring GitHub issue summary and PR metrics to retrospective
